Symbol.Script_3D:
! Gas Emergency Power Generator
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
DEFINE MATERIAL "Shaft Black Plastic" 20, 0.147059, 0.135294, 0.103922, 0.9, 0.6, 0.2, 0, 10, 0, 1, 0.978103, 0.968383, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0
DEFINE MATERIAL "Shaft White Plastic" 20, 1, 1, 1, 0.98, 0.8, 0.25, 0, 3, 0, 1, 1, 1, 0.654902, 0.654902, 0.654902, 100, 0, -1, 0
DEFINE MATERIAL "Shaft Aluminum" 20, 0.854902, 0.913725, 0.905882, 0.98, 0.7, 0.5, 0, 7, 0, 0.907897, 0.907897, 0.907897, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0
! --- GAS POWER GENERATOR --- !
unID = 1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, B, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A, B, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, B, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT A, 0, boxBottom+boxHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A, B, boxBottom+boxHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 AND GLOB_CONTEXT <> 23 THEN ! Detailed ! Chaising ROTy 90 ROTz 90 railL = A
FOR i=1 TO 2 GOSUB 100 ADDx B MULx -1 NEXT i DEL 6
ADD 0, railThk, railH-railThk-4*railThk BLOCK A,B-2*railThk,4*railThk DEL 1
! Cooler coolerH = motorTop - 0.1 ADDz railH + 0.1 ROTx 90 PRISM 8,-B, 0, 0.06, 0, coolerH - 0.06, 0.02, coolerH - 0.06, 0.02, coolerH, coolerThk, coolerH, coolerThk, 0, 0.02, 0, 0.02, 0.06 DEL 2
ADD coolerThk, B/2-0.6*motorWidth,railH + 0.15 BLOCK 2*coolerThk, 1.2*motorWidth, coolerH - 0.1 DEL 1
! Gas Motor motorL = motorLength-3*coolerThk ADD 3*coolerThk, (B-motorWidth)/2, railH ROTx 90 PRISM 6,-motorWidth, 0,0, 0,motorTop-railH, 0.7*motorL,motorTop-railH, 0.7*motorL,0.85*motorTop-railH, motorL,0.85*motorTop-railH, motorL,0 DEL 2
! Box ADD A-boxDepth,0,railH BLOCK boxDepth, 2*railThk, ZZYZX - railH ADDy B-2*railThk BLOCK boxDepth, 2*railThk, ZZYZX - railH DEL 2 ADD A-boxDepth, 2*railThk, boxBottom BLOCK boxDepth, B-4*railThk, boxHeight DEL 1
! Metering ADD A+0.001,0.3*B,boxBottom+0.12 ROTz 90 ROTx 90 MATERIAL "Shaft Black Plastic" IF useSysMat THEN MATERIAL sMat POLY_ 10, -0.060, 0.050, 1, -0.060,-0.050, 1, 0.060,-0.050, 1, 0.060, 0.050, 1, -0.060, 0.050, -1, -0.050, 0.040, 1, -0.050,-0.020, 1, 0.050,-0.020, 1, 0.050, 0.040, 1, -0.050, 0.040, -1
ROTz 30 POLY 4, -0.001, 0.030, -0.001,-0.020, 0.001,-0.020, 0.001, 0.030 DEL 1 MATERIAL "Shaft White Plastic" IF useSysMat THEN MATERIAL sMat POLY_ 4, -0.050, 0.040, 1, -0.050,-0.020, 1, 0.050,-0.020, 1, 0.050, 0.040, 1 DEL 3
! Button ADD A+0.001,0.3*B + MIN(0.2, 0.45*B),boxBottom+0.12 ROTy 90 ROTz 90 MATERIAL "Shaft Aluminum" IF useSysMat THEN MATERIAL sMat POLY_ 3, 0,0, 901, 0.03,360,4001, 0.02,360,4001
CYLIND 0.01,0.02 ADDz 0.01 PRISM 4, 0.01, -0.01, 0.02, -0.01,-0.06, 0.01,-0.06, 0.01, 0.02 DEL 4
MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial
! Generator RESOL res ADD motorLength, B/2,genWidth/2+railH ROTy 90 genL = A-boxDepth-motorLength+0.1 CYLIND genL, genWidth/2 ADDz genL/2 IF genWidth>EPS THEN CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0,913, genWidth/2,360,4013 PRISM 4, genL/2, 0,-genWidth/3, -0.6*genWidth,-genWidth/3, -0.6*genWidth, genWidth/3, 0, genWidth/3 CUTEND ENDIF DEL 2 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 AND GLOB_CONTEXT <> 23 THEN ! Simple ! Chaising ROTy 90 ROTz 90 railL = A
FOR i=1 TO 2 GOSUB 100 ADDx B MULx -1 NEXT i DEL 6
ADD 0, railThk, railH-railThk-4*railThk BLOCK A,B-2*railThk,4*railThk DEL 1
! Cooler coolerH = motorTop - 0.1 RESOL 10 ADDz railH + 0.1 BLOCK coolerThk, B, coolerH DEL 1
ADD coolerThk, B/2-0.6*motorWidth,railH + 0.15 BLOCK 2*coolerThk, 1.2*motorWidth, coolerH - 0.1 DEL 1
! Gas Motor motorL = motorLength-3*coolerThk ADD 3*coolerThk, (B-motorWidth)/2, railH ROTx 90 PRISM 6,-motorWidth, 0,0, 0,motorTop-railH, 0.7*motorL,motorTop-railH, 0.7*motorL,0.85*motorTop-railH, motorL,0.85*motorTop-railH, motorL,0 DEL 2
! Box ADD A-boxDepth,0,railH BLOCK boxDepth, 2*railThk, ZZYZX - railH ADDy B-2*railThk BLOCK boxDepth, 2*railThk, ZZYZX - railH DEL 2 ADD A-boxDepth, 2*railThk, boxBottom BLOCK boxDepth, B-4*railThk, boxHeight DEL 1
! Generator RESOL 10 ADD motorLength, B/2,genWidth/2+railH ROTy 90 genL = A-boxDepth-motorLength+0.1 CYLIND genL, genWidth/2 ADDz genL/2 IF genWidth>EPS THEN CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0,913, genWidth/2,360,4013 PRISM 4, genL/2, 0,-genWidth/3, -0.6*genWidth,-genWidth/3, -0.6*genWidth, genWidth/3, 0, genWidth/3 CUTEND ENDIF DEL 2 ENDIF
DEL TOP RESOL res
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 16, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 15 END
100: PRISM 8, railL, 0, 0, 0, railH, 4*railThk, railH, 4*railThk, railH-railThk, railThk, railH-railThk, railThk, railThk, 4*railThk, railThk, 4*railThk, 0 RETURN
110: PRISM 4, railL, 0, 0, 0, railH, 4*railThk, railH, 4*railThk, 0 RETURN
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Gas Emergency Power Generator
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
unID = 1 DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top
! --- GAS POWER GENERATOR --- !
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, B, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A, B, unID: unID=unID+1
IF GLOB_CONTEXT <> 22 THEN ! Chaising POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, coolerThk,0, 1, coolerThk,4*railThk, 1, A,4*railThk, 1, A,0,1 POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, coolerThk,B, 1, coolerThk,B-4*railThk, 1, A,B-4*railThk, 1, A,B,1 POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, coolerThk,4*railThk, 1, coolerThk,B-4*railThk, 1, A,B-4*railThk, 1, A,4*railThk,1
! Gas Motor motorL = motorLength-3*coolerThk ADD2 3*coolerThk, B/2 POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, motorWidth/2, 1, 0,-motorWidth/2,1, motorL,-motorWidth/2, 1, motorL, motorWidth/2,1 LINE2 0.7*motorL,-motorWidth/2, 0.7*motorL,motorWidth/2 DEL 1
! Generator ADD2 motorLength, B/2 POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, genWidth/2, 1, 0,-genWidth/2,1, A-boxDepth-motorLength,-genWidth/2, 1, A-boxDepth-motorLength, genWidth/2,1 DEL 1
! Box ADD2 A-boxDepth, B/2 POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, B/2, 1, 0,-B/2,1, boxDepth,-B/2, 1, boxDepth, B/2,1 DEL 1
! Cooler POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0, 1, 0,B, 1, coolerThk,B, 1, coolerThk,0,1 ADD2 0, B/2 POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 3*coolerThk,-0.6*motorWidth, 1, 3*coolerThk,0.6*motorWidth, 1, coolerThk,0.6*motorWidth, 1, coolerThk,-0.6*motorWidth,1 DEL 1
ENDIF ENDIF DEL TOP
! --- OTHER VIEWS --- !
ROT2 (SYMB_MIRRORED - NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED)) * (DrawingNum > 1) * SYMB_ROTANGLE
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * SYMB_MIRRORED, 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 12, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 5 DEL 1
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
! Gas Emergency Power Generator
EPS = 0.0001
! --- HARDCODED AND DERIVED VARIABLES --- !
minMotorLength = 0.2
railH = 0.15 * ZZYZX railThk = 0.1 * railH
coolerThk = MIN(0.08 * ZZYZX, MAX(minMotorLength, motorLength)/4)
boxHeight = ZZYZX-boxBottom genWidth = MIN(boxBottom-railH, motorWidth)
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! Gas Emergency Power Generator
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_attr[4][4] FOR i = 1 TO 4 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 2 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[2] ui_con_type[1] = 0 ui_con_type[2] = 0
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Gas Emergency Power Generator
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN !! maxZ=-99999 !! FOR i=1 TO MEP_NumberConnections !! actZ = O_Connections[i][PZ] - O_Connections[i][CL] * O_Connections[i][VZ] !! IF actZ > maxZ THEN maxZ=actZ !! NEXT i
minW = 0.50 IF A<minW THEN A=minW PARAMETERS A=minW ENDIF VALUES "A" RANGE [minW,]
minD = 0.30 IF B<minD THEN B=minD PARAMETERS B=minD ENDIF VALUES "B" RANGE [minD,]
minH = 0 IF ZZYZX<minH THEN ZZYZX=minH PARAMETERS ZZYZX=minH ENDIF VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [minH,] ENDIF
! --- OBJECT SPECIFIC PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="A" THEN IF motorLength>0.7*A THEN motorLength=0.7*A PARAMETERS motorLength=motorLength ENDIF IF boxDepth>0.25*A THEN boxDepth=0.25*A PARAMETERS boxDepth=boxDepth ENDIF ENDIF
motorMaxL=A-2*coolerThk-boxDepth/2-boxDepth IF motorLength>motorMaxL THEN motorLength=motorMaxL PARAMETERS motorLength=motorLength ENDIF VALUES "motorLength" RANGE[minMotorLength,motorMaxL] VALUES "boxDepth" RANGE[0.05,0.25*A]
coolerThk = MIN(0.08 * ZZYZX, motorLength/4) ! Compute coolerThk again
IF motorWidth>B THEN motorWidth=B PARAMETERS motorWidth=motorWidth ENDIF VALUES "motorWidth" RANGE[0.1, B]
motorTopMin=2*railH motorTopMax=ZZYZX IF motorTop<motorTopMin THEN motorTop=motorTopMin PARAMETERS motorTop=motorTop ENDIF IF motorTop>motorTopMax THEN motorTop=motorTopMax PARAMETERS motorTop=motorTop ENDIF VALUES "motorTop" RANGE[motorTopMin, motorTopMax]
boxBottomMin=railH boxBottomMax=ZZYZX-0.2 IF boxBottom<boxBottomMin THEN boxBottom=boxBottomMin PARAMETERS boxBottom=boxBottom ENDIF IF boxBottom>boxBottomMax THEN boxBottom=boxBottomMax PARAMETERS boxBottom=boxBottom ENDIF VALUES "boxBottom" RANGE[railH, boxBottomMax] ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 2
! --- CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Соединение Трубы`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = -1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = B/3
VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_1<EPS THEN ConWidth_1=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_1>maxCW THEN ConWidth_1=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=maxCW ENDIF
VALUES "ConPosX_1" RANGE[3*coolerThk+ConWidth_1/2, motorLength-ConWidth_1/2] PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = B/2-motorWidth/2 VALUES "ConPosZ_1" RANGE[railH+ConWidth_1/2, 0.85*motorTop-ConWidth_1/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Соединение Воздуховода`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 1
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = B/3
VALUES "ConLength_2" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_2" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_2<EPS THEN ConWidth_2=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_2>maxCW THEN ConWidth_2=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=maxCW ENDIF
VALUES "ConPosX_2" RANGE[3*coolerThk+ConWidth_2/2+ConWallThickness_2, 3*coolerThk+0.7*(motorLength-3*coolerThk)-ConWidth_2/2-ConWallThickness_2] VALUES "ConPosY_2" RANGE[B/2-motorWidth/2+ConWidth_2/2+ConWallThickness_2, B/2+motorWidth/2-ConWidth_2/2-ConWallThickness_2] PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = motorTop ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
